item.title: Berkshire Hathaway hikes Sirius XM stake to 37% after a sell-off on weak earnings
item.description: The Omaha-based conglomerate bought five million shares of Sirius XM via separate transactions on Thursday, Friday and Monday.

item.title: UBS downgrades Novo Nordisk, cites 'rapidly deteriorating growth' in GLP-1 market
item.description: Novo Nordisk is losing market share despite it having a "comprehensive portfolio" compared to peers, the firm said.

item.title: Bernstein says Oracle will see big gains, is set to become fourth-largest 'global hyperscaler'
item.description: Analyst Mark Moerdler reiterated his outperform rating and raised his price target.

item.title: Citi raises price target on Wayfair by more than $60, says tariffs will have less of an impact than feared
item.description: Wayfair has made "fundamental and sustainable" improvements that could benefit the stock after a wild ride this year, according to Citigroup.

item.title: Palantir earnings beat expectations. Here's what analysts are saying
item.description: Palantir also hiked its full-year guidance given explosive growth in artificial intelligence.
